page.title: 01Summary of our block
page.content:
Our block has Staverton, part of the Grange Estate ,Fords ,some small factory units and many acres of farm land. The farms grow wheat and barley mainly and rear cattle and sheep. Farmers take their animals to the markets at Banbury ,Rugby and Northampton. There may be a lot of farm land but there are not many farm houses and barns asd such. The only woods are two small ones near Staverton.Staverton wood is on top of Big Hill and contains mainly oak ,ash ,birch and pine trees.
The main hills in the block are Big Hill, Staverton Clump and the hill that Staverton is on.
West of Staverton lies the remains of the old railway line which was closed 15years ago .It has been dismantled now. It ran from S.W to N.E.
